title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 360-7.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 360-7.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

This Subpart specifies: (a) when MA will pay for covered medical care
and services; (b) who may receive
MA payment for providing covered medical care and services; (c) that recipients must cooperate in
obtaining payments from third parties; and
(d) that MA may pay for certain insurance
premiums, coinsurance and deductibles, and for reserved beds in medical
institutions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
360-7.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
